title: 4000 Buddhist Monks and other religious leaders at Monday’s Adishtana pooja
content: An Adishtana pooja and Satyagraha organised by the Surakimu Maubima National Organisation, to defeat anti-Sri Lankan forces and conspiracies will be held on Monday  at 4.00 p.m. at the Viharamaha Devi Park, Colombo….
